short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplifies process of search for issues in IV templates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply put this extension let you automate repetitive ctrl+c and ctrl+v operations.
How to use:
1. Open IV template page where you can send issues.
2. In another tab open article whom URL you want to copy-paste into template for testing.
3. Press extension's Icon.
4. It will automaticaly send current URL into template. Then you switch to template's tab.
